content: **crocheted hat in drops bomull-lin or drops paris piece is crocheted top down with double crochets and lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern l-149 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** one-size head circumference approx 54/58 cm = 21 1/4 /22 3/4 **materials** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g color 01 white or use drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200 g color 16 white **crochet gauge ** 18 double crochets in width and 10½ row vertically = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm = us e/4 hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller hook accessories approx 1½ metre = 59 thin steel wire for edge on brim
